Details.Name: GreateFor
Details.Feature: Receive 8,000 bonus miles when you charge a minimum of S$500 per month to your new Card for the first 2 months from the date of card approval date.

Earn 1.2 miles for every S$1 local spend; 2 miles for every $1 on overseas spend. Earn 3 miles for every $1 spent on online flights (eg: Cathay Pacific, Singapore Airlines, Silkair, JetStar, AirAsia etc) and accomodation (eg: Airbnb, Agoda, Expedia, Zuji etc).
Enjoy 2 Complimentary Global Airport Lounge Access visits within each 12-month period of Priority Pass Membership.

Details.Name: SmallPrint
Details.Feature: DBS Altitude Visa Cardholders must be registered with DBS Frequent Flyer Programme with a non-waivable annual fee of S$42.80. 1 DBS point can be converted to 2 Miles in blocks of 5000 points.
Additional miles awarded for online booking of flights and accomodation is capped at S$10,000 per calendar month.
5000 miles is awarded when S$800 is charged to the card within the first month of card approval. Promotion is only valid till 31 December 2015.

Feature.Name: Online Application Special Offer
Feature.FeatureRequire: 1: Apply online by 31 March 2016. 2: Get 8,000 bonus miles when you charge a minimum of S$500 per month to your new Card for the first 2 months from the date of card approval date.
